bow: flying with kids aged and months old any and all advice welcome hi am going on hour flight in few months with my husband and both our children we have seat for our son and are bringing our month old on as lap baby we took flight with my son same time last year when he was about years old but never before then so first time flying with an infant and also first time flying with kids looking for any tips ideas for the flight but also need advice for when we get to the hotel like what we would need for example realized last night am going to need baby bath we are flying domestic so can have an amazon order shipped directly to the hotel and have it waiting when we get there thanks in advance ordered one of those big inflatable tubs from amazon and it definitely big enough for both your sweet babies to use so you do have to put your two and half year old in the gross tub think that the oldest one will be your biggest challenge so based off of what they like would pack some activities and definitely snacks if you re allowed do know what time your flight is but it may be best to try to keep them both pretty worn out and maybe they will be able to sleep on the plane the risk of that is having them be totally exhausted and melting down on the plane though do necessarily agree with people who hand out treats to the other passengers to try to make them nicer about having children on the flight children are people and we were all little babies at one point so if they get on somebody nerves for hours then that life do sweat it too much and make sure you pack enough socks you ll have blast ve traveled fairly often with my kids and have found few things worth mentioning wear the baby in baby carrier to keep your hands free love my tula but anything that fits and is comfortable works gate check your stroller have toddler wear small back pack with their own change of pants sippy cup and snack plus whatever small comfort item they choose put toddler in the window seat have back up toys or snacks to bring out as last resort like keeping small magnadoodle and ziploc bag of pipe cleaners nurse or bottle during takeoff and landing try to avoid changing diapers on the plane do not feel guilt if your kids misbehave and scream or cry or throw up on the plane if you need to go pee ask flight attendant to hold the baby sit with toddler as long as they re not doing drinks service and the seat belt light off they ve always helped me out as far as gear for the hotel they ll have cots pack and plays for sleeping arrangements just make sure to let them know you need it ahead of time baby can always get washed up in towel padded sink basin ve also learned that unless you re traveling to very remote location pretty much anything you may need will be available locally only pack enough diapers wipes etc for the day of travel plus first night and hit up the grocery store for supplies the next morning for the year old something new for the plane ipad time new toys sticker books special snacks also board toward the end of boarding let the year old run around and watch planes as long as possible baby wear the infant makes getting through the airport so much easier especially with toddler to look after too ve flown lot with several kids at time myself currently pregnant for the 5th time and agree with everything you said only add that extra snacks are must like waaaay more than you think you ll need and do bother trying to be healthy single bag of amp has kept my toddler quiet for full 45 mins of hr flight also if you have tablet make sure it charged or download few kid friendly games on your phone pack the amount of snacks you think you ll need for your toddler and then pack 3x that amount if the year old is going to get some screen time on the flight have them practice with headphones the first time we used them with my now year old she was very confused and we spent half the flight convincing her she needed them to hear elsa bring an extra shirt for you for the flight because you never know definitely just do showers in the hotel when we traveled across country last year we brought our toddler car seat and put her in it for the flights she is used to sitting in it while moving so she did expect to get up and be crazy also she could nap if she wanted to sooo many good tips thank you wore my son in fabric baby carrier last year baby ktan definitely doing that again for new baby but did recently find out you can not wear the baby during takeoff and landing going to use it the rest of the time though it looks like you wrote lowercase instead of an uppercase this has happened 5891 times on reddit since the launch of this bot lol on the amp ms so funny he got an amazon fire tablet for his birthday and really likes it but do think need to get him used to headphones so he can use it on the flight without disrupting people it looks like you wrote lowercase instead of an uppercase this has happened 5915 times on reddit since the launch of this bot saw the inflatable tub gon na go with that or just winging it like others have mentioned absolutely not handing out treats or apologizing for having kids on the plane totally agree with you there good call on the socks amen did that last year and was dream was laughing watching other parents struggle with strollers and holding their babies we have the baby ktan for our infant and thinking about even using lillebaby for my older son and having them both in carriers through the airport it looks like you wrote lowercase instead of an uppercase this has happened 5944 times on reddit since the launch of this bot definitely good advice to practice with headphones didnt think of that ve read about packing an extra shirt before and will make sure to do that as well for me and my husband actually didnt think about the fact that they are used to staying still when in the carseat thats great point ive been back and forth about whether want to bring it with me or just rent car with carseat when we get there so much stuff dont know how to get through the airport with diaper bags stroller infant carseat annnd toddler carseat it sounds impossible once spent hour flight being puked on the whole time so definitely learned this lesson the hard way depends on the airline if you can wear them am flight attendant with major us carrier give it go if you and baby are comfortable the flight attendants will tell you otherwise if they do like it we used very light graco car seat we put all of her stuff in it and my husband just carted it through the airport we brought one of those umbrella strollers that was gate checked and plopped her in it between gates it actually worked pretty well my kid is constant mover the southwest staff suggested when she was old enough for her own seat to bring the carseat oh boy was this the best advice they suggested it would help keep things familiar especially since she was really good car rider it has been life saver you can get really lightweight and inexpensive one from wal mart we then bought huge caribener sp from rei and attached it to the stroller for walking quickly through the airport bring videos snacks art whatever little kiddo finds interesting good luck it cheaper to buy the 20 30 lightweight one from wal mart can look up the one we got it was very easy to use good to know thanks oh man that killer it amazing what we go through for these little guys recently got the baby jogger citi mini tour it is approved for overhead bin on airplane and folds pretty tiny so was planning on bringing that with us what do you thin about the hotel providing crib pack play do trust it or bring pack play in case it gross ve only ever had one hotel actually provide it luckily never trusted them so we always brought it one activity suggestion for the year old maps we just got back from trip with our toddler short one hour flight and looking at the map of the us that they had kept her busy the whole time pretty much we found the city where we live the city where we traveled the city where grandma and grandpa live and so on it was great source of entertainment was it the cosco https np reddit com message compose to=imguralbumbot amp subject=delet 20this amp message=delet 20this 20dtulm4k did that flight last summer but it was five hour flight and my second born was months my saviors were my ipad and lillebaby cartier also flew the red eye which helped them both take naps wasn as bad as was expecting we checked our big bags and used backpack for carry on or rolling bag attach the car seat to rolling carry on bag with luggage strap or put them on your stroller and gate check the stroller best read safest practice is to use the car seat on the plane keeps them in the seat safe from turbulence and they aren running around also keeps the seat from being damaged if you checked it and the car seats for rent at car rental places are dangerous bet you don know if the seat has been in an accident if it is expired how it has been cared for or if they will have the appropriate seat for your child sometimes all they have available is belt positioning booster and that is not an appropriate seat for kids less than years old that is our travel seat super compact and lightweight and easy to install did you use the lillebaby carrier for yourself older child to go through the airport cute idea just for my infant checked my stroller at the gate and made sure to keep my then year old close there were definitely moments of frustration with my toddler but once he got into his seat booked window and gave him snack and our ipad he settled right in cool good to know we have row booked so he can sit in the window seat me and baby in aisle and my husband in the middle hey fa for major airline too and baby carriers and wraps aren faa approved for airline use which means the baby can not be strapped into the wrap during taxi takeoff or landing they re simply not crash tested or are crash tested and the results didn pass safety regulations doesn matter what airline think you re saying some flight attendants just don want to deal and tell the parents to not do it but for the safety of all involved please hold your baby outside of the wrap or really advocate using carseat it the safest option just got back from trip with my infant and year old husband was not with us brought both car seats and the infant seat base stroller and two carry on bags one with the year old stuff books snacks tablet etc and diaper bag that doubled as my laptop bag could have brought more carry ons but it would have been unmanageable wore the baby in carrier checked both the car seats and the base at the curb along with the other checked luggage and used the stroller to cart the stuff through the airport if the year old is good at walking and staying by your side it really handy being able to move your stuff around all at once since you ca ever leave bags unattended you can gate check the stroller and then only have couple bags to deal with on the plane for security try to keep everything that will need to come out of the bag in one place like gallon zip lock full of feeding supplies for example if you do formula just put as much as you need for the airport in baggie check the rest or buy it once you re there good luck and if things start going wrong on the journey just remember you ll get there one way or another keep clean snacks on hand that you can easily grab our lo is yrs and we put youtube videos on of airplanes to get him excited the biggest winner is we have kid kindle with puzzle games lastly well rested child is happier child all that ll just add to make sure you and your partner are fed we both got hangry flying with our kids and it all went to hell pretty quick once we were fed everyone calmed down wish we had brought stroller for the 75 year old she refused to walk after while the baby was easy lots of great advice here already the only thing add is bring stickers and paper as toddler activity kept my older son busy for while on the plane though did have to peel the stickers off for him so some parental involvement required felt boards can be fun too but only if they do have too many pieces or you do mind losing few on the floor of the plane definitely find it nice to have my boppy for my baby much more comfortable to hold them while they nap or feed them bad bot hey human we do take kindly to your types around here *** ^^^i amp 32 amp 32 bot amp 32 *bleep* amp 32 *bloop* amp 32 amp 32 amp 32 **block** amp 32 20with 20the 20subject 20 27stop 27 20 amp 32 amp 32 **t҉he̛ amp 32 l̨is̕t** https np reddit com friendlybot wiki index amp 32 amp 32 ❤️ https np reddit com friendlybot comments 7hrupo suggestions if you can afford it get soft structured carrier like an ergo if the baby falls asleep on you you can just reach back and unclip the straps and hold the baby against your chest for takeoff then reclip the straps shortly after you re airborne if you have wrap like tan you have to physically pull the baby out and risk waking them here what would do check the infant carseat and whatever luggage you can when you check in buy cheapo convertible car seat like the cosco scenera next it 11lbs and not too difficult to lug around an airport wear the baby through security and either push your toddler in the stroller or get them backpack with harness so you can keep him within arms reach gate check the stroller bring the cheapo car seat on the plane and strap the toddler in this way you have minimal crap to carry and your hands are somewhat free you need to check if your hotel offers cribs if they do just call and request one and you should be good to go we have stayed at many hotels with pack plays and they have always been highly sanitary but if you re really worried bring an extra pack play sheet from home oh that awesome you have your husband with you flew solo cross country alone with our two boys think cause was expecting it to be total nightmare it instead turned out all right lol sure you guys will do fine and if you do its only temporary have fun that sounds do able thank you right so have the khan and lillebaby good point about just unclipping for takeoffs and landing but haven used the lillebaby with her would have to start now to get used to it before the flight yes that was something else thought of love having the biopsy for feeding her and also use it for playtime and stuff might have to stuff it in and make it fit lol great idea to play airplane videos we also ave the kids kindle and he loves it will definitely be utilizing it on the flight just keep mine on the stroller until check it at the gate and then just sort of hook it over the diaper bag to carry it onto the plane they have always let me have it on my lap even during take off and landing earplugs just travelled across country with my months old we gate checked his stroller but everything else we rented and had delivered to us at our car rental as there were four adults travelling for week along with ski gear this definitely saved us money on checked bags and the inconvenience of lugging everything through the airport we had great experience with it and would high recommend we were staying at an airbnb and rented pack and play mamaroo and infant car seat worth looking into rented from where we were vancouver and rented from company called wee travel most major cities have an option google infant equipment rentals name of city and you should be able to find one awesome love that thank you
